CustomField.formula: IF(And(Not (ISPICKVAL(Value_Customer_Rating6__c,"Red- Below Standard")),Not (ISPICKVAL(Value_Customer_Rating5__c,"Red- Below Standard"))),0, IF(And(Not (ISPICKVAL(Value_Customer_Rating6__c,"Red- Below Standard")), (ISPICKVAL(Value_Customer_Rating5__c,"Red- Below Standard"))),1, IF(And( (ISPICKVAL(Value_Customer_Rating6__c,"Red- Below Standard")),Not (ISPICKVAL(Value_Customer_Rating5__c,"Red- Below Standard"))),1, IF(And((ISPICKVAL(Value_Customer_Rating6__c,"Red- Below Standard")),(ISPICKVAL(Value_Customer_Rating5__c,"Red- Below Standard"))),2,0))))
CustomField.label: NPS Red Subtotal
